speaker: Derek Legenzoff
title: The AI Show: Ep 46 | Updates to Semantic Search and Speech
description:
Derek Legenzoff and Swarit Grover are here to share an exciting announcement regarding Semantic Configuration and Security Updates in Cognitive Search! https://aka.ms/CognitiveServicesFree. On the second half, Ayşegül will show you how you can translate and transcribe at the same time using Azure Speech Services.
